remarks: A special version of class substitution commonly used for structures. (Contributed by Thierry Arnoux, 15-Mar-2019.)
statement:
sbcie3s.a $e |- A = ( E ` W ) $.
sbcie3s.b $e |- B = ( F ` W ) $.
sbcie3s.c $e |- C = ( G ` W ) $.
sbcie3s.1 $e |- ( ( a = A /\ b = B /\ c = C ) -> ( ph <-> ps ) ) $.
sbcie3s $p |- ( w = W -> ( [. ( E ` w ) / a ]. [. ( F ` w ) / b ]. [. ( G ` w ) / c ]. ps <-> ph ) ) $.
$d E a b c $.
$d F b c $.
$d G c $.
$d W a b c $.
$d a b c ph $.
$d a b c w $.
